summary: A vicious killer escapes from San Quentin with a cannister of what he believes to be heroin but is actually a radioactive substance that threatens all Los Angeles.
cast: Vince Edwards|Lyle Talbot|John Archer|Steven Ritch|Patricia Blair|Kelly Thordsen|Joseph Mell|Sherwood Price|Kathie Browne|Larry J. Blake|Jean Harvey|Kenner G. Kemp|Michael Mark|Vic Perrin
title: City of Fear
